alert.note: Alert for Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:33PM EST until March 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM FRIDAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches in the northern half of the counties, with 1 to 3 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Medina, Summit, Portage and Trumbull counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Friday to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The bulk of the snow will fall during the morning when snow rates can exceed half an inch per hour. This will impact the morning commute. There will be a lull in the snow around midday as temperatures warm into the mid to upper 30s; which will allow conditions to significantly improve. Falling temperatures and lake enhanced snow showers can lead to slick travel and walking conditions returning during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
